Member Function Documentation

CallableStatement liquibase.database.sql.StoredProcedureStatement.createCallableStatement ( Database  database  )  throws SQLException

Create a callable statement in this connection.

Allows implementations to use CallableStatements.

Returns:
a callable statement
Exceptions:
java.sql.SQLException there is no need to catch SQLExceptions that may be thrown in the implementation of this method. The JdbcTemplate class will handle them.

Implements liquibase.database.sql.CallableSqlStatement.
